verses.verse: The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> again <WH3254> did <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of Yahweh, <WH3068> when Ehud <WH164> was dead. <WH4191>

Yahweh <WH3068> sold <WH4376> them into the hand <WH3027> of Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Canaan, <WH3667> who reigned <WH4427> in Hazor; <WH2674> the captain <WH8269> of whose army <WH6635> was Sisera, <WH5516> who lived <WH3427> in Harosheth <WH2800> of the Gentiles. <WH1471>

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH6817> to Yahweh: <WH3068> for he had nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> chariots <WH7393> of iron; <WH1270> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> he mightily <WH2394> oppressed <WH3905> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
Now Deborah, <WH1683> a prophetess, <WH5031> the wife <WH802> of Lappidoth, <WH3941> she judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> at that time. <WH6256>

She lived <WH3427> under the palm tree <WH8560> of Deborah <WH1683> between Ramah <WH7414> and Bethel <WH1008> in the hill <WH2022> country of Ephraim: <WH669> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came up <WH5927> to her for judgment. <WH4941>

She sent <WH7971> and called <WH7121> Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> out of Kedesh Naphtali, <WH6943> and said <WH559> to him, <WH3068> "Hasn't Yahweh, the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> commanded, <WH6680> <WH3212> 'Go and draw <WH4900> to Mount <WH2022> Tabor, <WH8396> and take <WH3947> with you ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> and of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun? <WH2074>

I will draw <WH4900> to you, <WH5158> to the river Kishon, <WH7028> Sisera, <WH5516> the captain <WH8269> of Jabin <WH2985>'s army, <WH6635> with his chariots <WH7393> and his multitude; <WH1995> and I will deliver <WH5414> him into your hand. <WH3027>'"
Barak <WH1301> said <WH559> to her, <WH3212> "If you will go with me, <WH3212> then I will go; but if you will not go <WH1980> with me, <WH3212> I will not go."

She said, <WH559> "I will surely <WH1980> go <WH3212> with you: <WH657> nevertheless, the journey <WH1870> that you take <WH1980> shall not be for your honor; <WH8597> for Yahweh <WH3068> will sell <WH4376> Sisera <WH5516> into the hand <WH3027> of a woman. <WH802>" Deborah <WH1683> arose, <WH6965> and went <WH3212> with Barak <WH1301> to Kedesh. <WH6943>

Barak <WH1301> called <WH2199> Zebulun <WH2074> and Naphtali <WH5321> together to Kedesh; <WH6943> and there went up <WH5927> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> at his feet: <WH7272> and Deborah <WH1683> went up with him. <WH5927>

Now Heber <WH2268> the Kenite <WH7017> had separated <WH6504> himself from the Kenites, <WH7017> even from the children <WH1121> of Hobab <WH2246> the brother-in <WH2859>-law of Moses, <WH4872> and had pitched <WH5186> his tent <WH168> as far as the oak <WH436> in Zaanannim, <WH6815> which is by Kedesh. <WH6943>
They told <WH5046> Sisera <WH5516> that Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> was gone up <WH5927> to Mount <WH2022> Tabor. <WH8396>

Sisera <WH5516> gathered together <WH2199> all his chariots, <WH7393> even nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> chariots <WH7393> of iron, <WH1270> and all the people <WH5971> who were with him, <WH2800> from Harosheth of the Gentiles, <WH1471> to the river <WH5158> Kishon. <WH7028>

Deborah <WH1683> said <WH559> to Barak, <WH1301> "Go; <WH6965> for this is the day <WH3117> in which Yahweh <WH3068> has delivered <WH5414> Sisera <WH5516> into your hand. <WH3027> Hasn't <WH3068> Yahweh gone out <WH3318> before <WH6440> you? <WH1301>" So Barak went down <WH3381> from Mount <WH2022> Tabor, <WH8396> and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> after him. <WH310>

Yahweh <WH3068> confused <WH2000> Sisera, <WH5516> and all his chariots, <WH7393> and all his army, <WH4264> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719> before <WH6440> Barak; <WH1301> and Sisera <WH5516> alighted from <WH3381> his chariot, <WH4818> and fled away <WH5127> on his feet. <WH7272>

But Barak <WH1301> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> the chariots, <WH7393> and after the army, <WH4264> to Harosheth <WH2800> of the Gentiles: <WH1471> and all the army <WH4264> of Sisera <WH5516> fell <WH5307> by the edge <WH6310> of the sword; <WH2719> there was not a man <WH259> left. <WH7604>

However Sisera <WH5516> fled away <WH5127> on his feet <WH7272> to the tent <WH168> of Jael <WH3278> the wife <WH802> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite; <WH7017> for there was peace <WH7965> between Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> and the house <WH1004> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite. <WH7017>

Jael <WH3278> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> Sisera, <WH5516> and said <WH559> to him, <WH5493> "Turn in, my lord, <WH113> turn in <WH5493> to me; <WH3372> don't be afraid." He came in <WH5493> to her into the tent, <WH168> and she covered <WH3680> him with a rug. <WH8063>

He said <WH559> to her, <WH4592> "Please give me a little water <WH4325> to drink; <WH8248> for I am thirsty. <WH6770>" She opened <WH6605> a bottle <WH4997> of milk, <WH2461> and gave him drink, <WH8248> and covered him. <WH3680>

He said <WH559> to her, <WH5975> "Stand in the door <WH6607> of the tent, <WH168> and it shall be, <WH376> when any man comes <WH935> and inquires <WH7592> of you, <WH559> and says, <WH3426> 'Is there any man <WH376> here? <WH3426>' that you shall say, <WH559> 'No.'"

Then Jael <WH3278> Heber <WH2268>'s wife <WH802> took <WH3947> a tent <WH168> peg, <WH3489> and took <WH7760> a hammer <WH4718> in her hand, <WH3027> and went <WH935> softly <WH3814> to him, <WH8628> and struck the peg <WH3489> into his temples, <WH7541> and it pierced through into <WH6795> the ground; <WH776> for he was in a deep sleep; <WH7290> so he swooned <WH5774> and died. <WH4191>

Behold, <WH1301> as Barak pursued <WH7291> Sisera, <WH5516> Jael <WH3278> came out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him, <WH559> and said to him, <WH3212> "Come, and I will show <WH7200> you the man <WH376> whom you seek. <WH1245>" He came <WH935> to her; <WH5516> and behold, Sisera lay <WH5307> dead, <WH4191> and the tent peg <WH3489> was in his temples. <WH7541>
So God <WH430> subdued <WH3665> on that day <WH3117> Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Canaan <WH3667> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

The hand <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> prevailed <WH7186> more <WH3212> and more against Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Canaan, <WH3667> until they had destroyed <WH3772> Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Canaan. <WH3667>
